content.query:
USE LoL_Data;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE item_details
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'lol_data/',
        DATA_SOURCE = lol_datasets,
        FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat
    )
AS
SELECT id,
    name,
    '14.4.1' AS patch
FROM 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'item_details_patch_14.4.1.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'lol_datasets',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS item_details
GROUP BY id, name;
